title: The Bar Tami Salad
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give The Bar Tami Salad a try. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 764 calories, 56g of protein, and 29g of fat. For $3.62 per serving, this recipe covers 35% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. This recipe is liked by 1 foodies and cooks. A mixture of lemon wedges, cherry tomatoes - i used amorosa tomatoes, flour, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. To use up the lemon wedges you could follow this main course with the Rolled Baklava as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 71%. This score is pretty good. Similar recipes include Tami's Tri Color Caprese Salad, Tami's Taco Soup, and kachumber salad or kuchumber salad – indian vegetable salad.
